trans-unit.source: Represents an individual data item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en individuelle dataelementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ListViewDataItem class represents an individual data item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ListViewDataItem representerer en individuelle dataelementet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A data item usually corresponds to a record in a data source object.
trans-unit.target: Et dataelement tilsvarer vanligvis en post i en datakildeobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control has a designated item type that is represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen har en angitt elementtype som representeres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When the item type is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, you can use the ListViewDataItem class to get more information about the item.
trans-unit.target: Når elementtypen er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, kan du bruke ListViewDataItem klassen for å få mer informasjon om elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control stores data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lagrer dataelementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a ListViewDataItem object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut indeksen for et ListViewDataItem objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen, bruker du <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the data item in the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne indeksen for dataelementet i den underliggende datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between these index properties is that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> represents the position of the data item in the current page, whereas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> is based on the page offset.
trans-unit.target: Forskjellen mellom egenskapene indeksen er at <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>representerer plasseringen av dataelementet i den gjeldende siden, mens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>er basert på siden forskyvningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the paging functionality is not enabled in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, these two properties will contain the same value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Bla-funksjonalitet ikke er aktivert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>kontroll, egenskapene to inneholder samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties of the underlying data object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til egenskapene for det underliggende dataobjektet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>egenskapen er tilgjengelig bare under og etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>hendelse for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewDataItem class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewDataItem, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>|The value of the `displayIndex` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `dataItemIndex` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `displayIndex` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>i underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: The position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av dataelement som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying data object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref> object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det underliggende dataobjektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"> </xref> objektet er bundet til.

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: DataItem-egenskapen er tilgjengelig bare under og etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>hendelse for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: The underlying data object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref> object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Det underliggende dataobjektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"> </xref> objektet er bundet til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>i underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataItemIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>i underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>i underliggende datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter posisjonen for dataelementet som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayIndex property corresponds to the current position of the item as displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisplayIndex samsvarer med gjeldende posisjon for elementet som vises av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Each item's DisplayIndex value reflects the order in which they were added to the control in that particular page of data.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for hvert element DisplayIndex gjenspeiler rekkefølgen de ble lagt til kontrollen i den bestemte siden av data.

trans-unit.source: You can use the DisplayIndex property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke DisplayIndex-egenskapen til å hente en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for dataelementer som.

trans-unit.source: It does not apply to insert items or empty items.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder ikke for å sette inn elementer eller tomme elementer.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte posisjonen for dataelementet som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om du vil sende en hendelse sidens ASP.NET server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been sent to the parent control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen er sendt til den overordnede kontrollen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
